msg: THRIFT-507. smalltalk: Remove an unnecessary include (boost/tokenizer)

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-850. Use AX_PROG_PERL_MODULES to test for Bit::Vector

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-506. Allow Thrift to be built without the C++ library
Currently, this is only possible by explicitly passing --without-cpp.
It might be better to name it --without-cxx, but it is probably more
important to keep consistency with the "cpp" generator and "lib/cpp".

author: dreiss
